newsitem.title: FINLAND: NOKIAN RENKAAT SAYS HENDERSON STAKE FALLS.
newsitem.headline: NOKIAN RENKAAT SAYS HENDERSON STAKE FALLS.

text.p: Henderson Financial Management Limited's stake in Nokian Renkaat has fallen to 5.9 pct of the share capital, Nokian Renkaat said in a statement on Tuesday, referring to a letter from Henderson.

"Henderson ... announced in the letter dated July 24, 1997 that its holding ... has decreased from 1,036,300 shares to 605,343 shares, which represents 5.9 percent of the company's share capital," it said.
Henderson still remained the third biggest shareholder after telecoms group Nokia Oy and SP Tyres UK Ltd, it said.
